name: GreatApps.com
overview:
Great Apps serves two markets:

1.App Users - We make it easy for consumers to learn about new apps.

2.App Developers/Owners - we help developers and businesses market their apps in a cost effective manner to reach users.

For consumers looking for apps: We display apps that developers and business owners truly believe in. To provide the best user experience and to preserve individuality, we only allow up to 15 new apps to be displayed daily. In addition to our searchable database, users have the option to receive customized email alerts of your favorite type of app or specific interest. On any given day, users can discover new apps that catch the eye. Something that makes you say “what a great app - I have to have it!”

For app developers and business owners: You have made your app and itâ€™s great. Now itâ€™s time get more downloads and users. GreatApps.com offers a platform to showcase your app(s) to people who may never have thought to search for it. Getting people to learn about your app can be an uphill battle; however, our unique marketing approach gives you the tools to get noticed. We have a national marketing reach that goes well beyond what an individual could typically achieve on their own. We have the most marketable URL’s in GreatApps.com and GreatApp.com. Our intuitive interface is designed to be simple to use and appeals to a broad audience of users. We only allow up to 15 new apps daily.

GreatApps.com also owns: GreatApp.com AppExposure.com MarketYourApp.com WeMarketApps.com
